title: Beguiling the Enemy’s Patriarch - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Comedic Undertone   Divine Protection   European Ambience   Evil Gods   Female Protagonist   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Kidnappings   Kingdoms   Magic   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   Sickly Characters   Sword And Magic   Transmigration
author: Dalseul
description:
“I fell in love with you the first time I met you.”

“But I don’t love you, princess..”

Eh?

“And you know, I already have a fiancée..” I can barely smile after he finished these two sentences. Just keep calm.

“You said she wasn’t your fiancée”

“Well, let’s call her my future fiancée then.”>
